original_text: Also, because you are united with Christ, you truly belong to God's people. No person has circumcised you to show this. It is like Christ himself has circumcised you, to show that you belong to God. It is like he has cut off your old nature which made you do bad things.
korean_text: 또 그 안에서 너희가 손으로 하지 아니한 할례를 받았으니 곧 육의 몸을 벗는 것이요 그리스도의 할례니라

sentences.original_text: Also, because you are united with Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 너희가 그리스도와 연합되어 있기 때문에

sentences.original_text: you truly belong to God's people
No person has circumcised you to show this
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 이것을 보여주기 위해 너희를 할례하지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: It is like Christ himself has circumcised you
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 그리스도 자신이 너희를 할례한 것과 같습니다

sentences.original_text: to show that you belong to God
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 하나님께 속한다는 것을 보여주기 위함입니다

sentences.original_text: It is like he has cut off your old nature
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 그가 너희의 옛 본성을 잘라낸 것과 같습니다

sentences.original_text: which made you do bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 너희에게 나쁜 일을 하게 만들었습니다
